website_summaries.verdict: An organic line of baby food from a well-known baby food brand.
pros: 3.5-ounce pouch is BPA-free and has non-GMO, organic ingredients
Pricing is similar to other organic brands
cons: Some buyers received pouches that were spoiled

customer_reviews.title: Great normally!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's eat a ton of pouches so we have them delivered every month. I was extremely unhappy with the packaging this month. I had two normal boxes, and then one set was just taped together and the boxes were mangled. The pouches are fine, I'm just disappointed with this "repackaging" because I'm wondering where these individual boxes have been...
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Veit

customer_reviews.title: Great product no issues
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical that these would come in damaged or have mold in them but thankfully they are clear packaging so you can see inside. They arrived in one box contained three individual boxes containing six of one flavor totaling 18. Baby love these! No issues with taste, flavor or packaging. We have this on subscribe and save great value
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome pouches. The smart flow tops are more rounded than any others we’ve tried which seems easier and more comfortable for my baby. The flavors are great. I’ve tried them and like them. I only wish there was less (natural) sugar by maybe mixing in More veggies but we do 50/50 with plain yogurt to balance it out. These shouldn’t be frozen. Do be cautious when ordering online. Our Amazon delivery person dropped them off in a snow storm and we received no notifications/no doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Just choose kindness

customer_reviews.title: Decent value. Good for a restock. Baby likes flavors (but he’s not pickey)
customer_reviews.text: Decent value. About what you would pay at the store. Maybe slightly cheaper depending on what the price is when you order (it changes). Have re-bought multiple times. Baby likes all flavors. Good for when you cant make it to the store and are running out. You just order these and BAM you are restocked (and don’t end up buying yourself treats at the grocery store while there). These are the “organic” gerbers (they usually cost slightly more). The blue pouches are the regular ones and they are usually slightly cheaper in cost per pouch at the store.
customer_reviews.author: GA Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far they best deal for baby food I’ve ever come across. My son is 9 months and eats 6 to 8 of these a day. Baby food can definitely become costly. These baby foods are yummy and also great quality for your buck. The Smart Flow mouth is the best thing that Gerber could have invented. He also loves all of the flavors, especially when we refrigerate them. Thank you Gerber, and Amazon for this amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrianna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Organic, convenient and mess free
customer_reviews.text: I love these fruit and veggie packets, they are so easy to use especially when you are out and about. I keep these in my diaper bag for my baby and they work great for visits with Nana, while we're out shopping or even just when she doesn't want to eat her regular vegetables with dinner. They are super easy to use and my baby just sucks it right out of the container and she loves them and I love them because there's no mess and because there are organic. I purchased these monthly with my subscribe and save and plan on purchasing them for many more months to come!! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was poor
customer_reviews.text: The pouches were just thrown in a box but the box said they would be in display trays. The seals don’t seem to be tampered with but I’m a little nervous to feed these too my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: these were delivered today and only had 12 packages which made them very overpriced!! also a few packs were puffy which means they have been left in a heated environment...... will be returning asap
customer_reviews.author: B Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Versatile food packs!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these packs. He is less than a year old and kinda picky. He has enjoyed the flavors so far. They can get messy if you hand the packs over to your baby. I’d say wait till they are about 1 year old so they can handle the packs with little supervision. My son squeezed out half a pack on shirt. Lol. that was fun cleaning that up and my son was not to happy about that. They are also great options to pack in their day care bags or when on the go. Give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Husl4it81

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Dumped in bowl to feed grand baby an was clumpy with mold $31.42 wasted threw both boxes in trash I ordered two boxes an wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Vicki pierce

customer_reviews.title: These Are Perfect To Add To Your Emergency Kits.
customer_reviews.text: We actually purchased these for our emergency kits. They do not need refrigeration and they are packed with nutrition. Easy to carry. I always have a few of these in each car and will pack one in my bag when I’m out for the day.
customer_reviews.author: OCAngel

customer_reviews.title: Love gerber pouches!
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy my toddler these Gerber organic pouches at Walmart at a price of $1.28 each. I've purchased this 18pc variety pack 2x now and was not disappointed. These are flavors our child likes and the bulk price was less than the Walmart price. If I find them on sale again, I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: It has no flavor, I taste one of my baby food, and the taste was too blend , taste like flavor plus a lots of water , after first try I decided to pass it , not good for baby ...
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: It stays in...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something my cancer patient husband can eat without getting sick and nauseous. This is it! The fruit/veggie paste gives him the nutrients he needs and is mild enough to stay in. Great taste and consistency..
customer_reviews.author: Ann Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sonny approved
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 7 month old grandson Sonny he really likes it and to be honest I’ve tasted it myself it ain’t bad! Good price, good flavor. Solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Princess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes this product is so good. My baby loves the flavors and the release mechanism is really good for managing flow.
customer_reviews.author: Wanzi

customer_reviews.title: Goof
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old likes it a lot. This is his favorite so far. The only con is the size. I wish it could be a big larger especially given the price.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Just as described! just watch price changes
customer_reviews.text: This is great, comes in 3 separate boxes per flavor. The only odd thing is the price changes constantly, so just keep an eye out on that. ranges from $15-$21 on any given day.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I like the slow flow, I also like the flavors. My daughter like the flavors too. A good price. Will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and spoiled product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible....how is it acceptable to deliver baby's food in this state? One pack already open and contents look bad...don't even want to see what's in the other packs...will be returning these ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Flora B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to buy and use
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for these. Grandbaby went to town eating any of these flavors. Handy to have them shipped instead of waiting at the store.
customer_reviews.author: mdjjsmemaw

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, just wish it was a little less expensive
customer_reviews.text: Making my baby's food is a little time consuming. This is the next best thing to homemade baby food. My baby loves the taste and it helps keep her healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 8 month daughter, however, my 5 year old love it and ate all of them...
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I always buy these and ship them to my family member's homes when traveling so we don't have to mess with a grocery store trip. We go through pouches so quickly this is definitely a good deal! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My babys love it
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves it my wife loves it more, she had it more than my boy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ren

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle doesn't flow well
customer_reviews.text: My baby enjoys these fruit pouches, but the nozzle doesn't flow well sometimes and she needs assistance using the pouch. She doesn't have this problem with other pouches like Plum Organics.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: KIDs love these. We like the fact you can see ...
customer_reviews.text: KIDs love these. We like the fact you can see the contents via the clear pouch material. Just a bit high on the sugar content.
customer_reviews.author: TFD

customer_reviews.title: Good in color, in flavor.
customer_reviews.text: My son since one years old is addicted to these packets. They don’t taste good to me but they taste good to the baby. I would put them in my car in case he cries and he will be happy and satisfied when he has these little treats.
customer_reviews.author: Dowdowdowcorona

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: Good baby food bought for my fourth month old son, was helping begin to taste real food, great buy, and pricing, he seemed to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! My son has a rare food allergy diagnosis called FPIES and so I have to be extremely careful to buy food with minimal and honest ingredients. I used to make all of my son’s purées, but now that he is older and I am working, I had to find food I could trust. Mama Bear Products are awesome, I cannot recommend them enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Wodehous

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: All the favors are too sweet. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these things, so I’ll keep buying thank you! It’s just that sometimes I don’t have time to go to the store and well I ordered it online and it was exactly the same
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting Since some people wrote bad things about it, but my product was in great condition thank you
customer_reviews.author: Danni16

customer_reviews.title: Useful for me...
customer_reviews.text: Use to mix with a powdered prescription with a horrible taste.
customer_reviews.author: frances R. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Love that the boxes are cut in a way that you can store in pantry
customer_reviews.author: Rawrlll

customer_reviews.title: easy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves every flavor. Easy to use and great to re seal. Was happy to not have to go to store.
customer_reviews.author: chrystal

customer_reviews.title: My baby likes it but I think it is too sugary, prefer making my own
customer_reviews.text: My baby enjoys this. My order got lost, so I had to order it again. Although my baby likes it but I personally think it contains too much sugar, so I plan on making my own puree to my baby instead.
customer_reviews.author: Archer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Wish wasn’t so $$
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get my 20m/o to get his nutrition...pretty picky lately-and these, he actually asks for! Also good when stored in the fridge :) Only thing...pretty pricy.
customer_reviews.author: AEL

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: these get the job done and my toddler absolutely loves them
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Manning II

customer_reviews.title: This is an ok deal if your little one does ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok deal if your little one does not eat very many pouches or is a very picky eater. Overall it saves MAYBE $3.00 in comparison to going to your local grocery store and buying 18 pouches of different variety.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Soft tube, babys favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves the flavors, the tubes are softer than other brands. This brand is by far my baby's favorite. It is the only brand she will eat a whole 4 oz in one day. With these she will eat the whole 4 oz in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: fantastic completely happy I actually get these for snacks between meals at work !!! Obviously I don’t have kids Haaaa lucky me :)
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy food online
customer_reviews.text: The food inside clearly looks like it was either left out in the heat and it has gone bad. I tasted one and it was horrid. Never have this problem in the stores
customer_reviews.author: Kate W

customer_reviews.title: Baby Love it (Even I taste some spoons :P)
customer_reviews.text: Baby love this food. I order variety pack always. Please provide more option in variety packs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My one year old lines this one. She likes the carrot flavor. The nipple design is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: The easy way to get your kid to eat veggies!
customer_reviews.text: My Toddler won't eat any vegetables.. Little does he know he gets veggies in these pouches everyday! He's tried lots of brands and homemade purees, he always prefers the Organic Gerber pouches! So convenient. Great price compared to stores! I subscribed and my son will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: LaciJean

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without them
customer_reviews.text: I have to buy these in bulk because my toddler and my baby could live off these pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. My baby boy likes them and he can feed himself with the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: BasiaD

customer_reviews.title: Healthy snack or meal
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves these as a snack. I've tried other brands but these are the ones he will finish. I tasted one and I know why he likes them so much!
customer_reviews.author: melissa blevins

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Decent grouping
customer_reviews.text: Two are kid favorites and one is snuck in as an okay flavor.... still a good grouping for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Mom2under2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My step daughter loves these things, will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Darkangelx5150x

customer_reviews.title: Strange packaging so beware
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and only 1 of the 3 boxes was a regular original Gerber box the other two were very strange and one was even white with the wrong age on it and in a different language. Kind of concerning
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in great shape. My daughter loves the flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love Them
customer_reviews.text: The kids love these and they are very convenient. Started giving them to my twins at about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Leo McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and tasty for my little guy
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves these. They come in great flavors and easy to use. Just wish they had less sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin N

customer_reviews.title: Not Organic!
customer_reviews.text: NOT Organic as stated in the description! I even returned and reordered to see if it was a mistake. Do not purchase if you want Gerber ORGANIC pouches.
customer_reviews.author: S.I.

customer_reviews.title: Great design and great food!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this baby food comes in clear pouches instead of OPEC ones. The flavor combinations are pleasant for my baby and I love the slow flow spouts but let her be able to hold the pouch herself with less mess
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old loves all of the varieties in this order. Pouches are super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: With Subscribe and Save, this deal is a very good buy. I wish that I had discovered these little pouches earlier. They are so good when you're out in your vehicle or just out for the day. Very little mess and it didn't take long for my little girl long to figure it out. Very handy and less messy with Sunday Church Dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves
customer_reviews.text: My baby is now 1 - has been eating these for months and still loves them.

customer_reviews.title: See through pouch
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can see through the pouch. Good flavors.

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: They taste really good for so many different fruits and vegetables in them

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Made of really great ingredients and is organic. My grandson loves the taste.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors.
customer_reviews.text: We buy these all the time. My son loves them. They are so easy to throw in the diaper bag for a snack or give to him in the car and not have to worry about him making a big mess.

customer_reviews.title: like love
customer_reviews.text: When you go out for a picnic the necessary food,simple can taste its delicious,taste is very suitable,children feel very helpful,but also has nutritional value,the product is affordable.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little pick me ups little ones need
customer_reviews.text: They are a. It pricey but great for the just woke up, just need a snack, too offs before bed moments. Kids get the hang of them young and they are easy to eat from without making a huge mess (long as you pay attention)
customer_reviews.author: Archibald Powell

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love to have these on hand for times when my kids are screaming for a snack. I can keep a few of these pouches on hand in the car, in the diaper bag, or even in my purse. My only complaint is that they can be messy with my younger child. They are easy to squeeze too much out and my back seat is a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Allred

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: Great grab and go Astronomers snack early AM crab and go no mess snack and organic. No idea what the sweeties think.
customer_reviews.author: David  W Somers

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the go snack & cheaper to buy them ...
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves these! Easy on the go snack & cheaper to buy them in bulk than individually at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: Yummy. Pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Too yummy. My older kid keeps eating them all. Price. Very watery consistency.
customer_reviews.author: moonhunt18

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: My 1 y/o loves these, maybe too much. He attacks these things. Usually he gets mad if I try to help him squeeze out the remainder he can’t get himself. I’ve tried a little of it and it’s very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these but I was sent the wrong variety pack.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has been enjoying these products. I appreciate that they were delivered on time.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Product itself as described, but packaging said it was suitable for 12 month + children.

customer_reviews.title: Babies luv it!
customer_reviews.text: The babies in my life love this stuff! Although it is cheaper to get in the store, I'll happily pay for the convenience

product_meta.title: Gerber Organic 2nd Foods, Fruit & Veggie Variety Pack Pureed Baby Food, 3.5 Ounce Pouch, 18 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Style:Baby Food| Flavor:Variety Pack 1| Size:3.5 Ounce (Pack of 18)It's not just organic, it's Gerber. Our Gerber Organic 2nd Foods Value Pack includes Carrots Apples & Mangoes, Apples Blueberries & Spinach, and Pears Peaches & Strawberries pouches. Each pouch lives up to over 100 Gerber quality checks. Now features our proprietary Smart Flow spout: flow control means more on your little one's spoon, not everywhere else.Warning Text: Feed with Care: Don't feed if cap seal is broken or pouch is damaged or swollen. Food when little ones are seated and supervised. Cap is not a toy; keep out of children's reach.
feature_bullets: New tastes: Continue your baby’s love of fruits & veggies Gerber 2nd Foods will expose them to a variety of tastes & ingredient combinations to help them accept new flavors. Non-GMO Project verified.

Real fruits & veggies: We bring you age-appropriate flavors & textures with real fruits & veggies that meet our high standards. Unsweetened & unsalted with no added starch, artificial flavors or colors

Pureed goodness: Introduce your little one to the goodness of fruits, veggies & other wholesome ingredients. Our baby food is lovingly made & quality tested before it's good enough to be called Gerber.

Wholesome options: Introduce your infant or toddler to fruits, veggies & other wholesome ingredients with Gerber infant formulas & breastfeeding supplements, cereals, puree pouches & tubs, snacks & more.
Nutrition for growing: Like your baby, we're always growing & learning. More than ever we're committed to being your partner in parenthood with quality ingredients, nutritious food & expert guidance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
